definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: grow numb (Ar. fa0jun grow cool; Syr. pag be cold; Targum [[פּוּג]] cease, be helpless; NH id. vanish);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּפָג לִבּוֹ]] Ge 45:26; 3 fs. [[תָּפוּג]] Ps 77:3 of hand (si vera l., v. [[נגר]]), i.e. drop helpless; Hb Hab 1:4 of [[תּוֹרָה]], i.e. be ineffective.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[נְפוּגׁתִי וְנִדְכֵּיתִי]] Ps 38:9 I am benumbed and crushed (fig.); rd. prob. also [[אֶפּוֹגׇה]] Ps 88:16 (for MT a(/p. leg. [[אָפוּנׇה]]), Ol Hup Dy Gr Che [[אָפוּגׇה]].
